186// To avoid accidentally taking ownership of core OpenCL types
187// such as cl_kernel constructors are made explicit
188// under OpenCL 1.2
189#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2) && !defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
190#define __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS explicit
191#else // #if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
192#define __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS
193#endif // #if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
194

196// in case they are not pre-defined

199#endif // #if !defined(CL_EXT_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED)

201#define CL_EXT_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED
202#endif // #if !defined(CL_EXT_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED)

243#if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS) || \
244 (defined(CL_VERSION_1_1) && !defined(CL_VERSION_1_2))
245#define __INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR(name) \
246 if (!pfn_##name) { \
247 pfn_##name = (PFN_##name)clGetExtensionFunctionAddress(#name); \
248 if (!pfn_##name) { \
249 } \
250 }
251#endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_1)
252
253#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
254#define __INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM(platform, name) \
255 if (!pfn_##name) { \
256 pfn_##name = \
257 (PFN_##name)clGetExtensionFunctionAddressForPlatform(platform, #name); \
258 if (!pfn_##name) { \
259 } \
260 }
261#endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_1)

270#if defined(__CL_ENABLE_EXCEPTIONS)
275class Error : public std::exception {
276private:
277 cl_int err_;
278 const char *errStr_;
279
280public:
290 Error(cl_int err, const char *errStr = NULL) : err_(err), errStr_(errStr) {}
291
292 ~Error() throw() {}
293
298 virtual const char *what() const throw() {
299 if (errStr_ == NULL) {
300 return "empty";
301 } else {
302 return errStr_;
303 }
304 }
305
310 cl_int err(void) const { return err_; }
311};
312
313#define __ERR_STR(x) #x
314#else
315#define __ERR_STR(x) NULL
316#endif // __CL_ENABLE_EXCEPTIONS
317
318namespace detail {
319#if defined(__CL_ENABLE_EXCEPTIONS)
320static inline cl_int errHandler(cl_int err, const char *errStr = NULL) {
321 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
322 throw Error(err, errStr);
323 }
324 return err;
325}
326#else
327static inline cl_int errHandler(cl_int err, const char *errStr = NULL) {
328 (void)errStr; // suppress unused variable warning
329 return err;
330}
331#endif // __CL_ENABLE_EXCEPTIONS
332} // namespace detail
333
335#if !defined(__CL_USER_OVERRIDE_ERROR_STRINGS)

407#define __ENQUEUE_COPY_IMAGE_TO_BUFFER_ERR __ERR_STR(clEnqueueCopyImageToBuffer)
408#define __ENQUEUE_COPY_BUFFER_TO_IMAGE_ERR __ERR_STR(clEnqueueCopyBufferToImage)

463#if !defined(__USE_DEV_STRING) && !defined(__NO_STD_STRING)
464typedef std::string STRING_CLASS;
465#elif !defined(__USE_DEV_STRING)
466
475class CL_EXT_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED string
476 CL_EXT_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED {
477private:
478 ::size_t size_;
479 char *str_;
480
481public:
483 string(void) : size_(0), str_(NULL) {}
484
496 string(const char *str, ::size_t size) : size_(size), str_(NULL) {
497 if (size > 0) {
498 str_ = new char[size_ + 1];
499 if (str_ != NULL) {
500 memcpy(str_, str, size_ * sizeof(char));
501 str_[size_] = '\0';
502 } else {
503 size_ = 0;
504 }
505 }
506 }
507
513 string(const char *str) : size_(0), str_(NULL) {
514 if (str) {
515 size_ = ::strlen(str);
516 }
517 if (size_ > 0) {
518 str_ = new char[size_ + 1];
519 if (str_ != NULL) {
520 memcpy(str_, str, (size_ + 1) * sizeof(char));
521 }
522 }
523 }
524
525 void resize(::size_t n) {
526 if (size_ == n) {
527 return;
528 }
529 if (n == 0) {
530 if (str_) {
531 delete[] str_;
532 }
533 str_ = NULL;
534 size_ = 0;
535 } else {
536 char *newString = new char[n + 1];
537 ::size_t copySize = n;
538 if (size_ < n) {
539 copySize = size_;
540 }
541 size_ = n;
542
543 if (str_) {
544 memcpy(newString, str_, (copySize + 1) * sizeof(char));
545 }
546 if (copySize < size_) {
547 memset(newString + copySize, 0, size_ - copySize);
548 }
549 newString[size_] = '\0';
550
551 delete[] str_;
552 str_ = newString;
553 }
554 }
555
556 const char &operator[](::size_t pos) const { return str_[pos]; }
557
558 char &operator[](::size_t pos) { return str_[pos]; }
559
566 string &operator=(const string &rhs) {
567 if (this == &rhs) {
568 return *this;
569 }
570
571 if (str_ != NULL) {
572 delete[] str_;
573 str_ = NULL;
574 size_ = 0;
575 }
576
577 if (rhs.size_ == 0 || rhs.str_ == NULL) {
578 str_ = NULL;
579 size_ = 0;
580 } else {
581 str_ = new char[rhs.size_ + 1];
582 size_ = rhs.size_;
583
584 if (str_ != NULL) {
585 memcpy(str_, rhs.str_, (size_ + 1) * sizeof(char));
586 } else {
587 size_ = 0;
588 }
589 }
590
591 return *this;
592 }
593
598 string(const string &rhs) : size_(0), str_(NULL) { *this = rhs; }
599
601 ~string() {
602 delete[] str_;
603 str_ = NULL;
604 }
605
607 ::size_t size(void) const { return size_; }
608
610 ::size_t length(void) const { return size(); }
611
615 const char *c_str(void) const { return (str_) ? str_ : ""; }
616};
617typedef cl::string STRING_CLASS;
618#endif // #elif !defined(__USE_DEV_STRING)
619
620#if !defined(__USE_DEV_VECTOR) && !defined(__NO_STD_VECTOR)
621#define VECTOR_CLASS std::vector
622#elif !defined(__USE_DEV_VECTOR)
623#define VECTOR_CLASS cl::vector
624
625#if !defined(__MAX_DEFAULT_VECTOR_SIZE)
626#define __MAX_DEFAULT_VECTOR_SIZE 10
627#endif
628
651template <typename T, unsigned int N = __MAX_DEFAULT_VECTOR_SIZE>
652class CL_EXT_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED vector {
653private:
654 T data_[N];
655 unsigned int size_;
656
657public:
659 vector() : size_(static_cast<unsigned int>(0)) {}
660
662 ~vector() { clear(); }
663
665 unsigned int size(void) const { return size_; }
666
672 void clear() {
673 while (!empty()) {
674 pop_back();
675 }
676 }
677
682 void push_back(const T &x) {
683 if (size() < N) {
684 new (&data_[size_]) T(x);
685 size_++;
686 } else {
687 detail::errHandler(CL_MEM_OBJECT_ALLOCATION_FAILURE,
688 __VECTOR_CAPACITY_ERR);
689 }
690 }
691
696 void pop_back(void) {
697 if (size_ != 0) {
698 --size_;
699 data_[size_].~T();
700 } else {
701 detail::errHandler(CL_MEM_OBJECT_ALLOCATION_FAILURE,
702 __VECTOR_CAPACITY_ERR);
703 }
704 }
705
710 vector(const vector<T, N> &vec) : size_(vec.size_) {
711 if (size_ != 0) {
712 assign(vec.begin(), vec.end());
713 }
714 }
715
722 vector(unsigned int size, const T &val = T()) : size_(0) {
723 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
724 push_back(val);
725 }
726 }
727
735 vector<T, N> &operator=(const vector<T, N> &rhs) {
736 if (this == &rhs) {
737 return *this;
738 }
739
740 if (rhs.size_ != 0) {
741 assign(rhs.begin(), rhs.end());
742 } else {
743 clear();
744 }
745
746 return *this;
747 }
748
753 bool operator==(vector<T, N> &vec) {
754 if (size() != vec.size()) {
755 return false;
756 }
757
758 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < size(); ++i) {
759 if (operator[](i) != vec[i]) {
760 return false;
761 }
762 }
763 return true;
764 }
765
767 operator T *() { return data_; }
768
770 operator const T *() const { return data_; }
771
773 bool empty(void) const { return size_ == 0; }
774
776 unsigned int max_size(void) const { return N; }
777
779 unsigned int capacity() const { return N; }
780
782 void resize(unsigned int newSize, T fill = T()) {
783 if (newSize > N) {
784 detail::errHandler(CL_MEM_OBJECT_ALLOCATION_FAILURE,
785 __VECTOR_CAPACITY_ERR);
786 } else {
787 while (size_ < newSize) {
788 new (&data_[size_]) T(fill);
789 size_++;
790 }
791 while (size_ > newSize) {
792 --size_;
793 data_[size_].~T();
794 }
795 }
796 }
797
804 T &operator[](int index) { return data_[index]; }
805
813 const T &operator[](int index) const { return data_[index]; }
814
823 template <class I> void assign(I start, I end) {
824 clear();
825 while (start != end) {
826 push_back(*start);
827 start++;
828 }
829 }
830
834 class iterator {
835 private:
836 const vector<T, N> *vec_;
837 int index_;
838
844 iterator(const vector<T, N> &vec, int index) : vec_(&vec) {
845 if (!vec.empty()) {
846 index_ = index;
847 } else {
848 index_ = -1;
849 }
850 }
851
852 public:
853 iterator(void) : index_(-1), vec_(NULL) {}
854
855 iterator(const iterator &rhs) : vec_(rhs.vec_), index_(rhs.index_) {}
856
857 ~iterator(void) {}
858
859 static iterator begin(const cl::vector<T, N> &vec) {
860 iterator i(vec, 0);
861
862 return i;
863 }
864
865 static iterator end(const cl::vector<T, N> &vec) {
866 iterator i(vec, vec.size());
867
868 return i;
869 }
870
871 bool operator==(iterator i) {
872 return ((vec_ == i.vec_) && (index_ == i.index_));
873 }
874
875 bool operator!=(iterator i) { return (!(*this == i)); }
876
877 iterator &operator++() {
878 ++index_;
879 return *this;
880 }
881
882 iterator operator++(int) {
883 iterator retVal(*this);
884 ++index_;
885 return retVal;
886 }
887
888 iterator &operator--() {
889 --index_;
890 return *this;
891 }
892
893 iterator operator--(int) {
894 iterator retVal(*this);
895 --index_;
896 return retVal;
897 }
898
899 const T &operator*() const { return (*vec_)[index_]; }
900 };
901
902 iterator begin(void) { return iterator::begin(*this); }
903
904 iterator begin(void) const { return iterator::begin(*this); }
905
906 iterator end(void) { return iterator::end(*this); }
907
908 iterator end(void) const { return iterator::end(*this); }
909
910 T &front(void) { return data_[0]; }
911
912 T &back(void) { return data_[size_]; }
913
914 const T &front(void) const { return data_[0]; }
915
916 const T &back(void) const { return data_[size_ - 1]; }
917} CL_EXT_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED;
918#endif // #if !defined(__USE_DEV_VECTOR) && !defined(__NO_STD_VECTOR)
919
920namespace detail {
921#define __DEFAULT_NOT_INITIALIZED 1
922#define __DEFAULT_BEING_INITIALIZED 2
923#define __DEFAULT_INITIALIZED 4
924
925/*
926 * Compare and exchange primitives are needed for handling of defaults
927 */
928
929#ifdef CL_HPP_CPP11_ATOMICS_SUPPORTED
930inline int compare_exchange(std::atomic<int> *dest, int exchange, int comparand)
931#else // !CL_HPP_CPP11_ATOMICS_SUPPORTED
932inline int compare_exchange(volatile int *dest, int exchange, int comparand)
933#endif // !CL_HPP_CPP11_ATOMICS_SUPPORTED
934{
935#ifdef CL_HPP_CPP11_ATOMICS_SUPPORTED
936 std::atomic_compare_exchange_strong(dest, &comparand, exchange);
937 return comparand;
938#elif _MSC_VER
939 return (int)(_InterlockedCompareExchange((volatile long *)dest,
940 (long)exchange, (long)comparand));
941#else // !_MSC_VER && !CL_HPP_CPP11_ATOMICS_SUPPORTED
942 return (__sync_val_compare_and_swap(dest, comparand, exchange));
943#endif // !CL_HPP_CPP11_ATOMICS_SUPPORTED
944}
945
946inline void fence() {
947#ifdef CL_HPP_CPP11_ATOMICS_SUPPORTED
948 std::atomic_thread_fence(std::memory_order_seq_cst);
949#elif _MSC_VER // !CL_HPP_CPP11_ATOMICS_SUPPORTED
950 _ReadWriteBarrier();
951#else // !_MSC_VER && !CL_HPP_CPP11_ATOMICS_SUPPORTED
952 __sync_synchronize();
953#endif // !CL_HPP_CPP11_ATOMICS_SUPPORTED
954}
955} // namespace detail
956
961template <int N> class size_t {
962private:
963 ::size_t data_[N];
964
965public:
967 size_t() {
968 for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
969 data_[i] = 0;
970 }
971 }
972
973 ::size_t &operator[](int index) { return data_[index]; }
974
975 const ::size_t &operator[](int index) const { return data_[index]; }
976
978 operator ::size_t *() { return data_; }
979
981 operator const ::size_t *() const { return data_; }
982};
983
984namespace detail {
985
986// Generic getInfoHelper. The final parameter is used to guide overload
987// resolution: the actual parameter passed is an int, which makes this
988// a worse conversion sequence than a specialization that declares the
989// parameter as an int.
990template <typename Functor, typename T>
991inline cl_int getInfoHelper(Functor f, cl_uint name, T *param, long) {
992 return f(name, sizeof(T), param, NULL);
993}
994
995// Specialized getInfoHelper for VECTOR_CLASS params
996template <typename Func, typename T>
997inline cl_int getInfoHelper(Func f, cl_uint name, VECTOR_CLASS<T> *param,
998 long) {
999 ::size_t required;
1000 cl_int err = f(name, 0, NULL, &required);
1001 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1002 return err;
1003 }
1004
1005 T *value = (T *)alloca(required);
1006 err = f(name, required, value, NULL);
1007 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1008 return err;
1009 }
1010
1011 param->assign(&value[0], &value[required / sizeof(T)]);
1012 return CL_SUCCESS;
1013}
1014
1015/* Specialization for reference-counted types. This depends on the
1016 * existence of Wrapper<T>::cl_type, and none of the other types having the
1017 * cl_type member. Note that simplify specifying the parameter as Wrapper<T>
1018 * does not work, because when using a derived type (e.g. Context) the generic
1019 * template will provide a better match.
1020 */
1021template <typename Func, typename T>
1022inline cl_int getInfoHelper(Func f, cl_uint name, VECTOR_CLASS<T> *param, int,
1023 typename T::cl_type = 0) {
1024 ::size_t required;
1025 cl_int err = f(name, 0, NULL, &required);
1026 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1027 return err;
1028 }
1029
1030 typename T::cl_type *value = (typename T::cl_type *)alloca(required);
1031 err = f(name, required, value, NULL);
1032 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1033 return err;
1034 }
1035
1036 ::size_t elements = required / sizeof(typename T::cl_type);
1037 param->assign(&value[0], &value[elements]);
1038 for (::size_t i = 0; i < elements; i++) {
1039 if (value[i] != NULL) {
1040 err = (*param)[i].retain();
1041 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1042 return err;
1043 }
1044 }
1045 }
1046 return CL_SUCCESS;
1047}
1048
1049// Specialized for getInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BINARIES>
1050template <typename Func>
1051inline cl_int getInfoHelper(Func f, cl_uint name, VECTOR_CLASS<char *> *param,
1052 int) {
1053 cl_int err = f(name, param->size() * sizeof(char *), &(*param)[0], NULL);
1054
1055 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1056 return err;
1057 }
1058
1059 return CL_SUCCESS;
1060}
1061
1062// Specialized GetInfoHelper for STRING_CLASS params
1063template <typename Func>
1064inline cl_int getInfoHelper(Func f, cl_uint name, STRING_CLASS *param, long) {
1065#if defined(__NO_STD_VECTOR) || defined(__NO_STD_STRING)
1066 ::size_t required;
1067 cl_int err = f(name, 0, NULL, &required);
1068 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1069 return err;
1070 }
1071
1072 char *value = (char *)alloca(required);
1073 err = f(name, required, value, NULL);
1074 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1075 return err;
1076 }
1077
1078 *param = value;
1079 return CL_SUCCESS;
1080#else
1081 ::size_t required;
1082 cl_int err = f(name, 0, NULL, &required);
1083 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1084 return err;
1085 }
1086
1087 // std::string has a constant data member
1088 // a char vector does not
1089 VECTOR_CLASS<char> value(required);
1090 err = f(name, required, value.data(), NULL);
1091 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1092 return err;
1093 }
1094 if (param) {
1095 param->assign(value.begin(), value.end());
1096 }
1097#endif
1098 return CL_SUCCESS;
1099}
1100
1101// Specialized GetInfoHelper for cl::size_t params
1102template <typename Func, ::size_t N>
1103inline cl_int getInfoHelper(Func f, cl_uint name, size_t<N> *param, long) {
1104 ::size_t required;
1105 cl_int err = f(name, 0, NULL, &required);
1106 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1107 return err;
1108 }
1109
1110 ::size_t *value = (::size_t *)alloca(required);
1111 err = f(name, required, value, NULL);
1112 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1113 return err;
1114 }
1115
1116 for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
1117 (*param)[i] = value[i];
1118 }
1119
1120 return CL_SUCCESS;
1121}
1122
1123template <typename T> struct ReferenceHandler;
1124
1125/* Specialization for reference-counted types. This depends on the
1126 * existence of Wrapper<T>::cl_type, and none of the other types having the
1127 * cl_type member. Note that simplify specifying the parameter as Wrapper<T>
1128 * does not work, because when using a derived type (e.g. Context) the generic
1129 * template will provide a better match.
1130 */
1131template <typename Func, typename T>
1132inline cl_int getInfoHelper(Func f, cl_uint name, T *param, int,
1133 typename T::cl_type = 0) {
1134 typename T::cl_type value;
1135 cl_int err = f(name, sizeof(value), &value, NULL);
1136 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1137 return err;
1138 }
1139 *param = value;
1140 if (value != NULL) {
1141 err = param->retain();
1142 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1143 return err;
1144 }
1145 }
1146 return CL_SUCCESS;
1147}
1148

1342
1343template <typename enum_type, cl_int Name> struct param_traits {};
1344
1345#define __CL_DECLARE_PARAM_TRAITS(token, param_name, T) \
1346 struct token; \
1347 template <> struct param_traits<detail::token, param_name> { \
1348 enum { value = param_name }; \
1349 typedef T param_type; \
1350 };
1351
1352__PARAM_NAME_INFO_1_0(__CL_DECLARE_PARAM_TRAITS)
1353#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_1)
1354__PARAM_NAME_INFO_1_1(__CL_DECLARE_PARAM_TRAITS)
1355#endif // CL_VERSION_1_1
1356#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
1357__PARAM_NAME_INFO_1_2(__CL_DECLARE_PARAM_TRAITS)
1358#endif // CL_VERSION_1_1
1359
1360#if defined(USE_CL_DEVICE_FISSION)
1361__PARAM_NAME_DEVICE_FISSION(__CL_DECLARE_PARAM_TRAITS);
1362#endif // USE_CL_DEVICE_FISSION
1363

1365__CL_DECLARE_PARAM_TRAITS(cl_platform_info, CL_PLATFORM_ICD_SUFFIX_KHR,
1366 STRING_CLASS)
1367#endif

1426#endif
1427#ifdef CL_DEVICE_WARP_SIZE_NV
1428__CL_DECLARE_PARAM_TRAITS(cl_device_info, CL_DEVICE_WARP_SIZE_NV, cl_uint)
1429#endif
1430#ifdef CL_DEVICE_GPU_OVERLAP_NV
1431__CL_DECLARE_PARAM_TRAITS(cl_device_info, CL_DEVICE_GPU_OVERLAP_NV, cl_bool)
1432#endif
1433#ifdef CL_DEVICE_KERNEL_EXEC_TIMEOUT_NV
1434__CL_DECLARE_PARAM_TRAITS(cl_device_info, CL_DEVICE_KERNEL_EXEC_TIMEOUT_NV,
1435 cl_bool)
1436#endif
1437#ifdef CL_DEVICE_INTEGRATED_MEMORY_NV
1438__CL_DECLARE_PARAM_TRAITS(cl_device_info, CL_DEVICE_INTEGRATED_MEMORY_NV,
1439 cl_bool)
1440#endif
1441
1442// Convenience functions
1443
1444template <typename Func, typename T>
1445inline cl_int getInfo(Func f, cl_uint name, T *param) {
1446 return getInfoHelper(f, name, param, 0);
1447}
1448
1449template <typename Func, typename Arg0> struct GetInfoFunctor0 {
1450 Func f_;
1451 const Arg0 &arg0_;
1452 cl_int operator()(cl_uint param, ::size_t size, void *value,
1453 ::size_t *size_ret) {
1454 return f_(arg0_, param, size, value, size_ret);
1455 }
1456};
1457
1458template <typename Func, typename Arg0, typename Arg1> struct GetInfoFunctor1 {
1459 Func f_;
1460 const Arg0 &arg0_;
1461 const Arg1 &arg1_;
1462 cl_int operator()(cl_uint param, ::size_t size, void *value,
1463 ::size_t *size_ret) {
1464 return f_(arg0_, arg1_, param, size, value, size_ret);
1465 }
1466};
1467
1468template <typename Func, typename Arg0, typename T>
1469inline cl_int getInfo(Func f, const Arg0 &arg0, cl_uint name, T *param) {
1470 GetInfoFunctor0<Func, Arg0> f0 = {f, arg0};
1471 return getInfoHelper(f0, name, param, 0);
1472}
1473
1474template <typename Func, typename Arg0, typename Arg1, typename T>
1475inline cl_int getInfo(Func f, const Arg0 &arg0, const Arg1 &arg1, cl_uint name,
1476 T *param) {
1477 GetInfoFunctor1<Func, Arg0, Arg1> f0 = {f, arg0, arg1};
1478 return getInfoHelper(f0, name, param, 0);
1479}
1480
1481template <typename T> struct ReferenceHandler {};
1482
1483#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
1487template <> struct ReferenceHandler<cl_device_id> {
1497 static cl_int retain(cl_device_id device) { return ::clRetainDevice(device); }
1507 static cl_int release(cl_device_id device) {
1508 return ::clReleaseDevice(device);
1509 }
1510};
1511#else // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
1515template <> struct ReferenceHandler<cl_device_id> {
1516 // cl_device_id does not have retain().
1517 static cl_int retain(cl_device_id) { return CL_SUCCESS; }
1518 // cl_device_id does not have release().
1519 static cl_int release(cl_device_id) { return CL_SUCCESS; }
1520};
1521#endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
1522
1523template <> struct ReferenceHandler<cl_platform_id> {
1524 // cl_platform_id does not have retain().
1525 static cl_int retain(cl_platform_id) { return CL_SUCCESS; }
1526 // cl_platform_id does not have release().
1527 static cl_int release(cl_platform_id) { return CL_SUCCESS; }
1528};
1529
1530template <> struct ReferenceHandler<cl_context> {
1531 static cl_int retain(cl_context context) {
1532 return ::clRetainContext(context);
1533 }
1534 static cl_int release(cl_context context) {
1535 return ::clReleaseContext(context);
1536 }
1537};
1538
1539template <> struct ReferenceHandler<cl_command_queue> {
1540 static cl_int retain(cl_command_queue queue) {
1541 return ::clRetainCommandQueue(queue);
1542 }
1543 static cl_int release(cl_command_queue queue) {
1544 return ::clReleaseCommandQueue(queue);
1545 }
1546};
1547
1548template <> struct ReferenceHandler<cl_mem> {
1549 static cl_int retain(cl_mem memory) { return ::clRetainMemObject(memory); }
1550 static cl_int release(cl_mem memory) { return ::clReleaseMemObject(memory); }
1551};
1552
1553template <> struct ReferenceHandler<cl_sampler> {
1554 static cl_int retain(cl_sampler sampler) {
1555 return ::clRetainSampler(sampler);
1556 }
1557 static cl_int release(cl_sampler sampler) {
1558 return ::clReleaseSampler(sampler);
1559 }
1560};
1561
1562template <> struct ReferenceHandler<cl_program> {
1563 static cl_int retain(cl_program program) {
1564 return ::clRetainProgram(program);
1565 }
1566 static cl_int release(cl_program program) {
1567 return ::clReleaseProgram(program);
1568 }
1569};
1570
1571template <> struct ReferenceHandler<cl_kernel> {
1572 static cl_int retain(cl_kernel kernel) { return ::clRetainKernel(kernel); }
1573 static cl_int release(cl_kernel kernel) { return ::clReleaseKernel(kernel); }
1574};
1575
1576template <> struct ReferenceHandler<cl_event> {
1577 static cl_int retain(cl_event event) { return ::clRetainEvent(event); }
1578 static cl_int release(cl_event event) { return ::clReleaseEvent(event); }
1579};
1580
1581// Extracts version number with major in the upper 16 bits, minor in the lower
1582// 16
1583static cl_uint getVersion(const char *versionInfo) {
1584 int highVersion = 0;
1585 int lowVersion = 0;
1586 int index = 7;
1587 while (versionInfo[index] != '.') {
1588 highVersion *= 10;
1589 highVersion += versionInfo[index] - '0';
1590 ++index;
1591 }
1592 ++index;
1593 while (versionInfo[index] != ' ' && versionInfo[index] != '\0') {
1594 lowVersion *= 10;
1595 lowVersion += versionInfo[index] - '0';
1596 ++index;
1597 }
1598 return (highVersion << 16) | lowVersion;
1599}
1600
1601static cl_uint getPlatformVersion(cl_platform_id platform) {
1602 ::size_t size = 0;
1603 clGetPlatformInfo(platform, CL_PLATFORM_VERSION, 0, NULL, &size);
1604 char *versionInfo = (char *)alloca(size);
1605 clGetPlatformInfo(platform, CL_PLATFORM_VERSION, size, &versionInfo[0],
1606 &size);
1607 return getVersion(versionInfo);
1608}
1609
1610static cl_uint getDevicePlatformVersion(cl_device_id device) {
1611 cl_platform_id platform;
1612 clGetDeviceInfo(device, CL_DEVICE_PLATFORM, sizeof(platform), &platform,
1613 NULL);
1614 return getPlatformVersion(platform);
1615}
1616
1617#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2) && defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
1618static cl_uint getContextPlatformVersion(cl_context context) {
1619 // The platform cannot be queried directly, so we first have to grab a
1620 // device and obtain its context
1621 ::size_t size = 0;
1622 clGetContextInfo(context, CL_CONTEXT_DEVICES, 0, NULL, &size);
1623 if (size == 0)
1624 return 0;
1625 cl_device_id *devices = (cl_device_id *)alloca(size);
1626 clGetContextInfo(context, CL_CONTEXT_DEVICES, size, devices, NULL);
1627 return getDevicePlatformVersion(devices[0]);
1628}
1629#endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2) &&
1630 // defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
1631
1632template <typename T> class Wrapper {
1633public:
1634 typedef T cl_type;
1635
1636protected:
1637 cl_type object_;
1638
1639public:
1640 Wrapper() : object_(NULL) {}
1641
1642 Wrapper(const cl_type &obj) : object_(obj) {}
1643
1644 ~Wrapper() {
1645 if (object_ != NULL) {
1646 release();
1647 }
1648 }
1649
1650 Wrapper(const Wrapper<cl_type> &rhs) {
1651 object_ = rhs.object_;
1652 if (object_ != NULL) {
1653 detail::errHandler(retain(), __RETAIN_ERR);
1654 }
1655 }
1656
1657#if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
1658 Wrapper(Wrapper<cl_type> &&rhs) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT {
1659 object_ = rhs.object_;
1660 rhs.object_ = NULL;
1661 }
1662#endif
1663
1664 Wrapper<cl_type> &operator=(const Wrapper<cl_type> &rhs) {
1665 if (this != &rhs) {
1666 if (object_ != NULL) {
1667 detail::errHandler(release(), __RELEASE_ERR);
1668 }
1669 object_ = rhs.object_;
1670 if (object_ != NULL) {
1671 detail::errHandler(retain(), __RETAIN_ERR);
1672 }
1673 }
1674 return *this;
1675 }
1676
1677#if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
1678 Wrapper<cl_type> &operator=(Wrapper<cl_type> &&rhs) {
1679 if (this != &rhs) {
1680 if (object_ != NULL) {
1681 detail::errHandler(release(), __RELEASE_ERR);
1682 }
1683 object_ = rhs.object_;
1684 rhs.object_ = NULL;
1685 }
1686 return *this;
1687 }
1688#endif
1689
1690 Wrapper<cl_type> &operator=(const cl_type &rhs) {
1691 if (object_ != NULL) {
1692 detail::errHandler(release(), __RELEASE_ERR);
1693 }
1694 object_ = rhs;
1695 return *this;
1696 }
1697
1698 cl_type operator()() const { return object_; }
1699
1700 cl_type &operator()() { return object_; }
1701
1702protected:
1703 template <typename Func, typename U>
1704 friend inline cl_int getInfoHelper(Func, cl_uint, U *, int,
1705 typename U::cl_type);
1706
1707 cl_int retain() const { return ReferenceHandler<cl_type>::retain(object_); }
1708
1709 cl_int release() const { return ReferenceHandler<cl_type>::release(object_); }
1710};
1711
1712template <> class Wrapper<cl_device_id> {
1713public:
1714 typedef cl_device_id cl_type;
1715
1716protected:
1717 cl_type object_;
1718 bool referenceCountable_;
1719
1720 static bool isReferenceCountable(cl_device_id device) {
1721 bool retVal = false;
1722 if (device != NULL) {
1723 int version = getDevicePlatformVersion(device);
1724 if (version > ((1 << 16) + 1)) {
1725 retVal = true;
1726 }
1727 }
1728 return retVal;
1729 }
1730
1731public:
1732 Wrapper() : object_(NULL), referenceCountable_(false) {}
1733
1734 Wrapper(const cl_type &obj) : object_(obj), referenceCountable_(false) {
1735 referenceCountable_ = isReferenceCountable(obj);
1736 }
1737
1738 ~Wrapper() {
1739 if (object_ != NULL) {
1740 release();
1741 }
1742 }
1743
1744 Wrapper(const Wrapper<cl_type> &rhs) {
1745 object_ = rhs.object_;
1746 referenceCountable_ = isReferenceCountable(object_);
1747 if (object_ != NULL) {
1748 detail::errHandler(retain(), __RETAIN_ERR);
1749 }
1750 }
1751
1752#if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
1753 Wrapper(Wrapper<cl_type> &&rhs) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT {
1754 object_ = rhs.object_;
1755 referenceCountable_ = rhs.referenceCountable_;
1756 rhs.object_ = NULL;
1757 rhs.referenceCountable_ = false;
1758 }
1759#endif
1760
1761 Wrapper<cl_type> &operator=(const Wrapper<cl_type> &rhs) {
1762 if (this != &rhs) {
1763 if (object_ != NULL) {
1764 detail::errHandler(release(), __RELEASE_ERR);
1765 }
1766 object_ = rhs.object_;
1767 referenceCountable_ = rhs.referenceCountable_;
1768 if (object_ != NULL) {
1769 detail::errHandler(retain(), __RETAIN_ERR);
1770 }
1771 }
1772 return *this;
1773 }
1774
1775#if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
1776 Wrapper<cl_type> &operator=(Wrapper<cl_type> &&rhs) {
1777 if (this != &rhs) {
1778 if (object_ != NULL) {
1779 detail::errHandler(release(), __RELEASE_ERR);
1780 }
1781 object_ = rhs.object_;
1782 referenceCountable_ = rhs.referenceCountable_;
1783 rhs.object_ = NULL;
1784 rhs.referenceCountable_ = false;
1785 }
1786 return *this;
1787 }
1788#endif
1789
1790 Wrapper<cl_type> &operator=(const cl_type &rhs) {
1791 if (object_ != NULL) {
1792 detail::errHandler(release(), __RELEASE_ERR);
1793 }
1794 object_ = rhs;
1795 referenceCountable_ = isReferenceCountable(object_);
1796 return *this;
1797 }
1798
1799 cl_type operator()() const { return object_; }
1800
1801 cl_type &operator()() { return object_; }
1802
1803protected:
1804 template <typename Func, typename U>
1805 friend inline cl_int getInfoHelper(Func, cl_uint, U *, int,
1806 typename U::cl_type);
1807
1808 template <typename Func, typename U>
1809 friend inline cl_int getInfoHelper(Func, cl_uint, VECTOR_CLASS<U> *, int,
1810 typename U::cl_type);
1811
1812 cl_int retain() const {
1813 if (referenceCountable_) {
1814 return ReferenceHandler<cl_type>::retain(object_);
1815 } else {
1816 return CL_SUCCESS;
1817 }
1818 }
1819
1820 cl_int release() const {
1821 if (referenceCountable_) {
1822 return ReferenceHandler<cl_type>::release(object_);
1823 } else {
1824 return CL_SUCCESS;
1825 }
1826 }
1827};
1828
1829} // namespace detail
1831
1837struct ImageFormat : public cl_image_format {
1839 ImageFormat() {}
1840
1842 ImageFormat(cl_channel_order order, cl_channel_type type) {
1843 image_channel_order = order;
1844 image_channel_data_type = type;
1845 }
1846
1848 ImageFormat &operator=(const ImageFormat &rhs) {
1849 if (this != &rhs) {
1850 this->image_channel_data_type = rhs.image_channel_data_type;
1851 this->image_channel_order = rhs.image_channel_order;
1852 }
1853 return *this;
1854 }
1855};
1856
1864class Device : public detail::Wrapper<cl_device_id> {
1865public:
1867 Device() : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>() {}
1868
1873 __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS Device(const cl_device_id &device)
1874 : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(device) {}
1875
1880 static Device getDefault(cl_int *err = NULL);
1881
1886 Device &operator=(const cl_device_id &rhs) {
1887 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
1888 return *this;
1889 }
1890
1894 Device(const Device &dev) : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(dev) {}
1895
1899 Device &operator=(const Device &dev) {
1900 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(dev);
1901 return *this;
1902 }
1903
1904#if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
1908 Device(Device &&dev) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT
1909 : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(std::move(dev)) {}
1910
1914 Device &operator=(Device &&dev) {
1915 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(std::move(dev));
1916 return *this;
1917 }
1918#endif // #if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
1919
1921 template <typename T> cl_int getInfo(cl_device_info name, T *param) const {
1922 return detail::errHandler(
1923 detail::getInfo(&::clGetDeviceInfo, object_, name, param),
1924 __GET_DEVICE_INFO_ERR);
1925 }
1926
1928 template <cl_int name>
1929 typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_device_info, name>::param_type
1930 getInfo(cl_int *err = NULL) const {
1931 typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_device_info, name>::param_type
1932 param;
1933 cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
1934 if (err != NULL) {
1935 *err = result;
1936 }
1937 return param;
1938 }
1939
1943#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
1945 cl_int createSubDevices(const cl_device_partition_property *properties,
1946 VECTOR_CLASS<Device> *devices) {
1947 cl_uint n = 0;
1948 cl_int err = clCreateSubDevices(object_, properties, 0, NULL, &n);
1949 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1950 return detail::errHandler(err, __CREATE_SUB_DEVICES);
1951 }
1952
1953 cl_device_id *ids = (cl_device_id *)alloca(n * sizeof(cl_device_id));
1954 err = clCreateSubDevices(object_, properties, n, ids, NULL);
1955 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1956 return detail::errHandler(err, __CREATE_SUB_DEVICES);
1957 }
1958
1959 devices->assign(&ids[0], &ids[n]);
1960 return CL_SUCCESS;
1961 }
1962#endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
1963
1967#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_1)
1968#if defined(USE_CL_DEVICE_FISSION)
1969 cl_int createSubDevices(const cl_device_partition_property_ext *properties,
1970 VECTOR_CLASS<Device> *devices) {
1971 typedef CL_API_ENTRY cl_int(CL_API_CALL * PFN_clCreateSubDevicesEXT)(
1972 cl_device_id /*in_device*/,
1973 const cl_device_partition_property_ext * /* properties */,
1974 cl_uint /*num_entries*/, cl_device_id * /*out_devices*/,
1975 cl_uint * /*num_devices*/) CL_EXT_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1;
1976
1977 static PFN_clCreateSubDevicesEXT pfn_clCreateSubDevicesEXT = NULL;
1978 __INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR(clCreateSubDevicesEXT);
1979
1980 cl_uint n = 0;
1981 cl_int err = pfn_clCreateSubDevicesEXT(object_, properties, 0, NULL, &n);
1982 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1983 return detail::errHandler(err, __CREATE_SUB_DEVICES);
1984 }
1985
1986 cl_device_id *ids = (cl_device_id *)alloca(n * sizeof(cl_device_id));
1987 err = pfn_clCreateSubDevicesEXT(object_, properties, n, ids, NULL);
1988 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1989 return detail::errHandler(err, __CREATE_SUB_DEVICES);
1990 }
1991
1992 devices->assign(&ids[0], &ids[n]);
1993 return CL_SUCCESS;
1994 }
1995#endif // #if defined(USE_CL_DEVICE_FISSION)
1996#endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_1)
1997};
1998
2006class Platform : public detail::Wrapper<cl_platform_id> {
2007public:
2009 Platform() : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>() {}
2010
2016 __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS Platform(const cl_platform_id &platform)
2017 : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(platform) {}
2018
2024 Platform &operator=(const cl_platform_id &rhs) {
2025 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
2026 return *this;
2027 }
2028
2030 cl_int getInfo(cl_platform_info name, STRING_CLASS *param) const {
2031 return detail::errHandler(
2032 detail::getInfo(&::clGetPlatformInfo, object_, name, param),
2033 __GET_PLATFORM_INFO_ERR);
2034 }
2035
2037 template <cl_int name>
2038 typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_platform_info, name>::param_type
2039 getInfo(cl_int *err = NULL) const {
2040 typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_platform_info, name>::param_type
2041 param;
2042 cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
2043 if (err != NULL) {
2044 *err = result;
2045 }
2046 return param;
2047 }
2048
2053 cl_int getDevices(cl_device_type type, VECTOR_CLASS<Device> *devices) const {
2054 cl_uint n = 0;
2055 if (devices == NULL) {
2056 return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_ARG_VALUE, __GET_DEVICE_IDS_ERR);
2057 }
2058 cl_int err = ::clGetDeviceIDs(object_, type, 0, NULL, &n);
2059 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2060 return detail::errHandler(err, __GET_DEVICE_IDS_ERR);
2061 }
2062
2063 cl_device_id *ids = (cl_device_id *)alloca(n * sizeof(cl_device_id));
2064 err = ::clGetDeviceIDs(object_, type, n, ids, NULL);
2065 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2066 return detail::errHandler(err, __GET_DEVICE_IDS_ERR);
2067 }
2068
2069 devices->assign(&ids[0], &ids[n]);
2070 return CL_SUCCESS;
2071 }
2072
2073#if defined(USE_DX_INTEROP)
2097 cl_int getDevices(cl_d3d10_device_source_khr d3d_device_source,
2098 void *d3d_object, cl_d3d10_device_set_khr d3d_device_set,
2099 VECTOR_CLASS<Device> *devices) const {
2100 typedef CL_API_ENTRY cl_int(CL_API_CALL * PFN_clGetDeviceIDsFromD3D10KHR)(
2101 cl_platform_id platform, cl_d3d10_device_source_khr d3d_device_source,
2102 void *d3d_object, cl_d3d10_device_set_khr d3d_device_set,
2103 cl_uint num_entries, cl_device_id *devices, cl_uint *num_devices);
2104
2105 if (devices == NULL) {
2106 return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_ARG_VALUE, __GET_DEVICE_IDS_ERR);
2107 }
2108
2109 static PFN_clGetDeviceIDsFromD3D10KHR pfn_clGetDeviceIDsFromD3D10KHR = NULL;
2110 __INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM(object_, clGetDeviceIDsFromD3D10KHR);
2111
2112 cl_uint n = 0;
2113 cl_int err = pfn_clGetDeviceIDsFromD3D10KHR(
2114 object_, d3d_device_source, d3d_object, d3d_device_set, 0, NULL, &n);
2115 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2116 return detail::errHandler(err, __GET_DEVICE_IDS_ERR);
2117 }
2118
2119 cl_device_id *ids = (cl_device_id *)alloca(n * sizeof(cl_device_id));
2120 err = pfn_clGetDeviceIDsFromD3D10KHR(object_, d3d_device_source, d3d_object,
2121 d3d_device_set, n, ids, NULL);
2122 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2123 return detail::errHandler(err, __GET_DEVICE_IDS_ERR);
2124 }
2125
2126 devices->assign(&ids[0], &ids[n]);
2127 return CL_SUCCESS;
2128 }
2129#endif
2130
2135 static cl_int get(VECTOR_CLASS<Platform> *platforms) {
2136 cl_uint n = 0;
2137
2138 if (platforms == NULL) {
2139 return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_ARG_VALUE, __GET_PLATFORM_IDS_ERR);
2140 }
2141
2142 cl_int err = ::clGetPlatformIDs(0, NULL, &n);
2143 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2144 return detail::errHandler(err, __GET_PLATFORM_IDS_ERR);
2145 }
2146
2147 cl_platform_id *ids = (cl_platform_id *)alloca(n * sizeof(cl_platform_id));
2148 err = ::clGetPlatformIDs(n, ids, NULL);
2149 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2150 return detail::errHandler(err, __GET_PLATFORM_IDS_ERR);
2151 }
2152
2153 platforms->assign(&ids[0], &ids[n]);
2154 return CL_SUCCESS;
2155 }
2156
2161 static cl_int get(Platform *platform) {
2162 cl_uint n = 0;
2163
2164 if (platform == NULL) {
2165 return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_ARG_VALUE, __GET_PLATFORM_IDS_ERR);
2166 }
2167
2168 cl_int err = ::clGetPlatformIDs(0, NULL, &n);
2169 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2170 return detail::errHandler(err, __GET_PLATFORM_IDS_ERR);
2171 }
2172
2173 cl_platform_id *ids = (cl_platform_id *)alloca(n * sizeof(cl_platform_id));
2174 err = ::clGetPlatformIDs(n, ids, NULL);
2175 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2176 return detail::errHandler(err, __GET_PLATFORM_IDS_ERR);
2177 }
2178
2179 *platform = ids[0];
2180 return CL_SUCCESS;
2181 }
2182
2187 static Platform get(cl_int *errResult = NULL) {
2188 Platform platform;
2189 cl_uint n = 0;
2190 cl_int err = ::clGetPlatformIDs(0, NULL, &n);
2191 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2192 detail::errHandler(err, __GET_PLATFORM_IDS_ERR);
2193 if (errResult != NULL) {
2194 *errResult = err;
2195 }
2196 return Platform();
2197 }
2198
2199 cl_platform_id *ids = (cl_platform_id *)alloca(n * sizeof(cl_platform_id));
2200 err = ::clGetPlatformIDs(n, ids, NULL);
2201
2202 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2203 detail::errHandler(err, __GET_PLATFORM_IDS_ERR);
2204 if (errResult != NULL) {
2205 *errResult = err;
2206 }
2207 return Platform();
2208 }
2209
2210 return Platform(ids[0]);
2211 }
2212
2213 static Platform getDefault(cl_int *errResult = NULL) {
2214 return get(errResult);
2215 }
2216
2217#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
2219 cl_int unloadCompiler() { return ::clUnloadPlatformCompiler(object_); }
2220#endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
2221}; // class Platform
2222
2226#if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS) || \
2227 (defined(CL_VERSION_1_1) && !defined(CL_VERSION_1_2))
2232inline CL_EXT_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED cl_int UnloadCompiler()
2233 CL_EXT_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED;
2234inline cl_int UnloadCompiler() { return ::clUnloadCompiler(); }
2235#endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_1)
2236
2245class Context : public detail::Wrapper<cl_context> {
2246private:
2247#ifdef CL_HPP_CPP11_ATOMICS_SUPPORTED
2248 static std::atomic<int> default_initialized_;
2249#else // !CL_HPP_CPP11_ATOMICS_SUPPORTED
2250 static volatile int default_initialized_;
2251#endif // !CL_HPP_CPP11_ATOMICS_SUPPORTED
2252 static Context default_;
2253 static volatile cl_int default_error_;
2254
2255public:
2260 Context(const VECTOR_CLASS<Device> &devices,
2261 cl_context_properties *properties = NULL,
2262 void(CL_CALLBACK *notifyFptr)(const char *, const void *, ::size_t,
2263 void *) = NULL,
2264 void *data = NULL, cl_int *err = NULL) {
2265 cl_int error;
2266
2267 ::size_t numDevices = devices.size();
2268 cl_device_id *deviceIDs =
2269 (cl_device_id *)alloca(numDevices * sizeof(cl_device_id));
2270 for (::size_t deviceIndex = 0; deviceIndex < numDevices; ++deviceIndex) {
2271 deviceIDs[deviceIndex] = (devices[deviceIndex])();
2272 }
2273
2274 object_ = ::clCreateContext(properties, (cl_uint)numDevices, deviceIDs,
2275 notifyFptr, data, &error);
2276
2277 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_CONTEXT_ERR);
2278 if (err != NULL) {
2279 *err = error;
2280 }
2281 }
2282
2283 Context(const Device &device, cl_context_properties *properties = NULL,
2284 void(CL_CALLBACK *notifyFptr)(const char *, const void *, ::size_t,
2285 void *) = NULL,
2286 void *data = NULL, cl_int *err = NULL) {
2287 cl_int error;
2288
2289 cl_device_id deviceID = device();
2290
2291 object_ =
2292 ::clCreateContext(properties, 1, &deviceID, notifyFptr, data, &error);
2293
2294 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_CONTEXT_ERR);
2295 if (err != NULL) {
2296 *err = error;
2297 }
2298 }
2299
2305 Context(cl_device_type type, cl_context_properties *properties = NULL,
2306 void(CL_CALLBACK *notifyFptr)(const char *, const void *, ::size_t,
2307 void *) = NULL,
2308 void *data = NULL, cl_int *err = NULL) {
2309 cl_int error;
2310
2311#if !defined(__APPLE__) && !defined(__MACOS)
2312 cl_context_properties prop[4] = {CL_CONTEXT_PLATFORM, 0, 0, 0};
2313
2314 if (properties == NULL) {
2315 // Get a valid platform ID as we cannot send in a blank one
2316 VECTOR_CLASS<Platform> platforms;
2317 error = Platform::get(&platforms);
2318 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
2319 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_CONTEXT_FROM_TYPE_ERR);
2320 if (err != NULL) {
2321 *err = error;
2322 }
2323 return;
2324 }
2325
2326 // Check the platforms we found for a device of our specified type
2327 cl_context_properties platform_id = 0;
2328 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < platforms.size(); i++) {
2329
2330 VECTOR_CLASS<Device> devices;
2331
2332#if defined(__CL_ENABLE_EXCEPTIONS)
2333 try {
2334#endif
2335
2336 error = platforms[i].getDevices(type, &devices);
2337
2338#if defined(__CL_ENABLE_EXCEPTIONS)
2339 } catch (Error) {
2340 }
2341 // Catch if exceptions are enabled as we don't want to exit if first
2342 // platform has no devices of type We do error checking next anyway, and
2343 // can throw there if needed
2344#endif
2345
2346 // Only squash CL_SUCCESS and CL_DEVICE_NOT_FOUND
2347 if (error != CL_SUCCESS && error != CL_DEVICE_NOT_FOUND) {
2348 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_CONTEXT_FROM_TYPE_ERR);
2349 if (err != NULL) {
2350 *err = error;
2351 }
2352 }
2353
2354 if (devices.size() > 0) {
2355 platform_id = (cl_context_properties)platforms[i]();
2356 break;
2357 }
2358 }
2359
2360 if (platform_id == 0) {
2361 detail::errHandler(CL_DEVICE_NOT_FOUND, __CREATE_CONTEXT_FROM_TYPE_ERR);
2362 if (err != NULL) {
2363 *err = CL_DEVICE_NOT_FOUND;
2364 }
2365 return;
2366 }
2367
2368 prop[1] = platform_id;
2369 properties = &prop[0];
2370 }
2371#endif
2372 object_ =
2373 ::clCreateContextFromType(properties, type, notifyFptr, data, &error);
2374
2375 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_CONTEXT_FROM_TYPE_ERR);
2376 if (err != NULL) {
2377 *err = error;
2378 }
2379 }
2380
2384 Context(const Context &ctx) : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(ctx) {}
2385
2389 Context &operator=(const Context &ctx) {
2390 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(ctx);
2391 return *this;
2392 }
2393
2394#if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
2398 Context(Context &&ctx) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT
2399 : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(std::move(ctx)) {}
2400
2404 Context &operator=(Context &&ctx) {
2405 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(std::move(ctx));
2406 return *this;
2407 }
2408#endif // #if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
2409
2415 static Context getDefault(cl_int *err = NULL) {
2416 int state = detail::compare_exchange(&default_initialized_,
2417 __DEFAULT_BEING_INITIALIZED,
2418 __DEFAULT_NOT_INITIALIZED);
2419
2420 if (state & __DEFAULT_INITIALIZED) {
2421 if (err != NULL) {
2422 *err = default_error_;
2423 }
2424 return default_;
2425 }
2426
2427 if (state & __DEFAULT_BEING_INITIALIZED) {
2428 // Assume writes will propagate eventually...
2429 while (default_initialized_ != __DEFAULT_INITIALIZED) {
2430 detail::fence();
2431 }
2432
2433 if (err != NULL) {
2434 *err = default_error_;
2435 }
2436 return default_;
2437 }
2438
2439 cl_int error;
2440 default_ = Context(CL_DEVICE_TYPE_DEFAULT, NULL, NULL, NULL, &error);
2441
2442 detail::fence();
2443
2444 default_error_ = error;
2445 // Assume writes will propagate eventually...
2446 default_initialized_ = __DEFAULT_INITIALIZED;
2447
2448 detail::fence();
2449
2450 if (err != NULL) {
2451 *err = default_error_;
2452 }
2453 return default_;
2454 }
2455
2457 Context() : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>() {}
2458
2464 __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS Context(const cl_context &context)
2465 : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(context) {}
2466
2472 Context &operator=(const cl_context &rhs) {
2473 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
2474 return *this;
2475 }
2476
2478 template <typename T> cl_int getInfo(cl_context_info name, T *param) const {
2479 return detail::errHandler(
2480 detail::getInfo(&::clGetContextInfo, object_, name, param),
2481 __GET_CONTEXT_INFO_ERR);
2482 }
2483
2485 template <cl_int name>
2486 typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_context_info, name>::param_type
2487 getInfo(cl_int *err = NULL) const {
2488 typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_context_info, name>::param_type
2489 param;
2490 cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
2491 if (err != NULL) {
2492 *err = result;
2493 }
2494 return param;
2495 }
2496
2501 cl_int getSupportedImageFormats(cl_mem_flags flags, cl_mem_object_type type,
2502 VECTOR_CLASS<ImageFormat> *formats) const {
2503 cl_uint numEntries;
2504
2505 if (!formats) {
2506 return CL_SUCCESS;
2507 }
2508
2509 cl_int err = ::clGetSupportedImageFormats(object_, flags, type, 0, NULL,
2510 &numEntries);
2511 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2512 return detail::errHandler(err, __GET_SUPPORTED_IMAGE_FORMATS_ERR);
2513 }
2514
2515 if (numEntries > 0) {
2516 ImageFormat *value =
2517 (ImageFormat *)alloca(numEntries * sizeof(ImageFormat));
2518 err = ::clGetSupportedImageFormats(object_, flags, type, numEntries,
2519 (cl_image_format *)value, NULL);
2520 if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2521 return detail::errHandler(err, __GET_SUPPORTED_IMAGE_FORMATS_ERR);
2522 }
2523
2524 formats->assign(&value[0], &value[numEntries]);
2525 } else {
2526 formats->clear();
2527 }
2528 return CL_SUCCESS;
2529 }
2530};
2531
2532inline Device Device::getDefault(cl_int *err) {
2533 cl_int error;
2534 Device device;
2535
2536 Context context = Context::getDefault(&error);
2537 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_CONTEXT_ERR);
2538
2539 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
2540 if (err != NULL) {
2541 *err = error;
2542 }
2543 } else {
2544 device = context.getInfo<CL_CONTEXT_DEVICES>()[0];
2545 if (err != NULL) {
2546 *err = CL_SUCCESS;
2547 }
2548 }
2549
2550 return device;
2551}
2552
2553#ifdef _WIN32
2554#ifdef CL_HPP_CPP11_ATOMICS_SUPPORTED
2555__declspec(selectany) std::atomic<int> Context::default_initialized_;
2556#else // !CL_HPP_CPP11_ATOMICS_SUPPORTED
2557__declspec(selectany) volatile int Context::default_initialized_ =
2558 __DEFAULT_NOT_INITIALIZED;
2559#endif // !CL_HPP_CPP11_ATOMICS_SUPPORTED
2560__declspec(selectany) Context Context::default_;
2561__declspec(selectany) volatile cl_int Context::default_error_ = CL_SUCCESS;
2562#else // !_WIN32
2563#ifdef CL_HPP_CPP11_ATOMICS_SUPPORTED
2564__attribute__((weak)) std::atomic<int> Context::default_initialized_;
2565#else // !CL_HPP_CPP11_ATOMICS_SUPPORTED
2566__attribute__((weak)) volatile int Context::default_initialized_ =
2567 __DEFAULT_NOT_INITIALIZED;
2568#endif // !CL_HPP_CPP11_ATOMICS_SUPPORTED
2569__attribute__((weak)) Context Context::default_;
2570__attribute__((weak)) volatile cl_int Context::default_error_ = CL_SUCCESS;
2571#endif // !_WIN32
2572

2592 : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(event) {}
2593
2599 Event &operator=(const cl_event &rhs) {
2600 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
2601 return *this;
2602 }
2603

2606 return detail::errHandler(
2607 detail::getInfo(&::clGetEventInfo, object_, name, param),
2608 __GET_EVENT_INFO_ERR);
2609 }

2616 param;

2627 return detail::errHandler(
2628 detail::getInfo(&::clGetEventProfilingInfo, object_, name, param),
2629 __GET_EVENT_PROFILE_INFO_ERR);
2630 }
2631
2633 template <cl_int name>
2634 typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_profiling_info, name>::param_type
2635 getProfilingInfo(cl_int *err = NULL) const {
2636 typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_profiling_info, name>::param_type
2637 param;
2638 cl_int result = getProfilingInfo(name, &param);
2639 if (err != NULL) {
2640 *err = result;
2641 }
2642 return param;
2643 }
2644
2649 cl_int wait() const {
2650 return detail::errHandler(::clWaitForEvents(1, &object_),
2651 __WAIT_FOR_EVENTS_ERR);
2652 }
2653
2654#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_1)
2660 cl_int setCallback(cl_int type,
2661 void(CL_CALLBACK *pfn_notify)(cl_event, cl_int, void *),
2662 void *user_data = NULL) {
2663 return detail::errHandler(
2664 ::clSetEventCallback(object_, type, pfn_notify, user_data),
2665 __SET_EVENT_CALLBACK_ERR);
2666 }
2667#endif
2668
2673 static cl_int waitForEvents(const VECTOR_CLASS<Event> &events) {
2674 return detail::errHandler(
2675 ::clWaitForEvents((cl_uint)events.size(),
2676 (events.size() > 0) ? (cl_event *)&events.front()
2677 : NULL),
2678 __WAIT_FOR_EVENTS_ERR);
2679 }
2680};

2682#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_1)

2695 object_ = ::clCreateUserEvent(context(), &error);
2696
2697 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_USER_EVENT_ERR);
2698 if (err != NULL) {
2699 *err = error;
2700 }
2701 }
2702
2704 UserEvent() : Event() {}

2711 return detail::errHandler(::clSetUserEventStatus(object_, status),
2712 __SET_USER_EVENT_STATUS_ERR);
2713 }
2714};
2715#endif
2716
2721inline static cl_int WaitForEvents(const VECTOR_CLASS<Event> &events) {
2722 return detail::errHandler(::clWaitForEvents((cl_uint)events.size(),
2723 (events.size() > 0)
2724 ? (cl_event *)&events.front()
2725 : NULL),
2726 __WAIT_FOR_EVENTS_ERR);
2727}

2737class Memory : public detail::Wrapper<cl_mem> {

2748 : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(memory) {}

2757 return *this;
2758 }

2770 return *this;
2771 }

2830
2831// Pre-declare copy functions
2832class Buffer;
2833template <typename IteratorType>
2834cl_int copy(IteratorType startIterator, IteratorType endIterator,
2835 cl::Buffer &buffer);
2836template <typename IteratorType>
2837cl_int copy(const cl::Buffer &buffer, IteratorType startIterator,
2838 IteratorType endIterator);
2839template <typename IteratorType>
2840cl_int copy(const CommandQueue &queue, IteratorType startIterator,
2841 IteratorType endIterator, cl::Buffer &buffer);
2842template <typename IteratorType>
2843cl_int copy(const CommandQueue &queue, const cl::Buffer &buffer,
2844 IteratorType startIterator, IteratorType endIterator);
2845
2852class Buffer : public Memory {
2853public:
2861 Buffer(const Context &context, cl_mem_flags flags, ::size_t size,
2862 void *host_ptr = NULL, cl_int *err = NULL) {
2863 cl_int error;
2864 object_ = ::clCreateBuffer(context(), flags, size, host_ptr, &error);
2865
2866 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
2867 if (err != NULL) {
2868 *err = error;
2869 }
2870 }
2871
2881 Buffer(cl_mem_flags flags, ::size_t size, void *host_ptr = NULL,
2882 cl_int *err = NULL) {
2883 cl_int error;
2884
2885 Context context = Context::getDefault(err);
2886
2887 object_ = ::clCreateBuffer(context(), flags, size, host_ptr, &error);
2888
2889 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
2890 if (err != NULL) {
2891 *err = error;
2892 }
2893 }
2894
2900 template <typename IteratorType>
2901 Buffer(IteratorType startIterator, IteratorType endIterator, bool readOnly,
2902 bool useHostPtr = false, cl_int *err = NULL) {
2903 typedef typename std::iterator_traits<IteratorType>::value_type DataType;
2904 cl_int error;
2905
2906 cl_mem_flags flags = 0;
2907 if (readOnly) {
2908 flags |= CL_MEM_READ_ONLY;
2909 } else {
2910 flags |= CL_MEM_READ_WRITE;
2911 }
2912 if (useHostPtr) {
2913 flags |= CL_MEM_USE_HOST_PTR;
2914 }
2915
2916 ::size_t size = sizeof(DataType) * (endIterator - startIterator);
2917
2918 Context context = Context::getDefault(err);
2919
2920 if (useHostPtr) {
2921 object_ =
2922 ::clCreateBuffer(context(), flags, size,
2923 static_cast<DataType *>(&*startIterator), &error);
2924 } else {
2925 object_ = ::clCreateBuffer(context(), flags, size, 0, &error);
2926 }
2927
2928 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
2929 if (err != NULL) {
2930 *err = error;
2931 }
2932
2933 if (!useHostPtr) {
2934 error = cl::copy(startIterator, endIterator, *this);
2935 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
2936 if (err != NULL) {
2937 *err = error;
2938 }
2939 }
2940 }
2941
2947 template <typename IteratorType>
2948 Buffer(const Context &context, IteratorType startIterator,
2949 IteratorType endIterator, bool readOnly, bool useHostPtr = false,
2950 cl_int *err = NULL);
2951
2957 template <typename IteratorType>
2958 Buffer(const CommandQueue &queue, IteratorType startIterator,
2959 IteratorType endIterator, bool readOnly, bool useHostPtr = false,
2960 cl_int *err = NULL);
2961
2963 Buffer() : Memory() {}
2964
2969 __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS Buffer(const cl_mem &buffer) : Memory(buffer) {}
2970
2975 Buffer &operator=(const cl_mem &rhs) {
2976 Memory::operator=(rhs);
2977 return *this;
2978 }
2979
2983 Buffer(const Buffer &buf) : Memory(buf) {}
2984
2988 Buffer &operator=(const Buffer &buf) {
2989 Memory::operator=(buf);
2990 return *this;
2991 }
2992
2993#if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
2997 Buffer(Buffer &&buf) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT : Memory(std::move(buf)) {}
2998
3002 Buffer &operator=(Buffer &&buf) {
3003 Memory::operator=(std::move(buf));
3004 return *this;
3005 }
3006#endif // #if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
3007
3008#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_1)
3013 Buffer createSubBuffer(cl_mem_flags flags,
3014 cl_buffer_create_type buffer_create_type,
3015 const void *buffer_create_info, cl_int *err = NULL) {
3016 Buffer result;
3017 cl_int error;
3018 result.object_ = ::clCreateSubBuffer(object_, flags, buffer_create_type,
3019 buffer_create_info, &error);
3020
3021 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_SUBBUFFER_ERR);
3022 if (err != NULL) {
3023 *err = error;
3024 }
3025
3026 return result;
3027 }
3028#endif
3029};
3030
3031#if defined(USE_DX_INTEROP)
3040class BufferD3D10 : public Buffer {
3041public:
3042 typedef CL_API_ENTRY cl_mem(CL_API_CALL *PFN_clCreateFromD3D10BufferKHR)(
3043 cl_context context, cl_mem_flags flags, ID3D10Buffer *buffer,
3044 cl_int *errcode_ret);
3045
3051 BufferD3D10(const Context &context, cl_mem_flags flags, ID3D10Buffer *bufobj,
3052 cl_int *err = NULL) {
3053 static PFN_clCreateFromD3D10BufferKHR pfn_clCreateFromD3D10BufferKHR = NULL;
3054
3055#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
3056 vector<cl_context_properties> props =
3057 context.getInfo<CL_CONTEXT_PROPERTIES>();
3058 cl_platform platform = -1;
3059 for (int i = 0; i < props.size(); ++i) {
3060 if (props[i] == CL_CONTEXT_PLATFORM) {
3061 platform = props[i + 1];
3062 }
3063 }
3064 __INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM(platform, clCreateFromD3D10BufferKHR);
3065#endif
3066#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_1)
3067 __INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR(clCreateFromD3D10BufferKHR);
3068#endif
3069
3070 cl_int error;
3071 object_ = pfn_clCreateFromD3D10BufferKHR(context(), flags, bufobj, &error);
3072
3073 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_GL_BUFFER_ERR);
3074 if (err != NULL) {
3075 *err = error;
3076 }
3077 }
3078
3080 BufferD3D10() : Buffer() {}
3081
3086 __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS BufferD3D10(const cl_mem &buffer)
3087 : Buffer(buffer) {}
3088
3093 BufferD3D10 &operator=(const cl_mem &rhs) {
3094 Buffer::operator=(rhs);
3095 return *this;
3096 }
3097
3101 BufferD3D10(const BufferD3D10 &buf) : Buffer(buf) {}
3102
3106 BufferD3D10 &operator=(const BufferD3D10 &buf) {
3107 Buffer::operator=(buf);
3108 return *this;
3109 }
3110
3111#if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
3115 BufferD3D10(BufferD3D10 &&buf) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT : Buffer(std::move(buf)) {}
3116
3120 BufferD3D10 &operator=(BufferD3D10 &&buf) {
3121 Buffer::operator=(std::move(buf));
3122 return *this;
3123 }
3124#endif // #if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
3125};
3126#endif
3127
3136class BufferGL : public Buffer {
3137public:
3143 BufferGL(const Context &context, cl_mem_flags flags, cl_GLuint bufobj,
3144 cl_int *err = NULL) {
3145 cl_int error;
3146 object_ = ::clCreateFromGLBuffer(context(), flags, bufobj, &error);
3147
3148 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_GL_BUFFER_ERR);
3149 if (err != NULL) {
3150 *err = error;
3151 }
3152 }
3153
3155 BufferGL() : Buffer() {}
3156
3161 __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS BufferGL(const cl_mem &buffer) : Buffer(buffer) {}
3162
3167 BufferGL &operator=(const cl_mem &rhs) {
3168 Buffer::operator=(rhs);
3169 return *this;
3170 }
3171
3175 BufferGL(const BufferGL &buf) : Buffer(buf) {}
3176
3180 BufferGL &operator=(const BufferGL &buf) {
3181 Buffer::operator=(buf);
3182 return *this;
3183 }
3184
3185#if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
3189 BufferGL(BufferGL &&buf) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT : Buffer(std::move(buf)) {}
3190
3194 BufferGL &operator=(BufferGL &&buf) {
3195 Buffer::operator=(std::move(buf));
3196 return *this;
3197 }
3198#endif // #if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
3199
3201 cl_int getObjectInfo(cl_gl_object_type *type, cl_GLuint *gl_object_name) {
3202 return detail::errHandler(
3203 ::clGetGLObjectInfo(object_, type, gl_object_name),
3204 __GET_GL_OBJECT_INFO_ERR);
3205 }
3206};
3207
3214class Image : public Memory {
3215protected:
3217 Image() : Memory() {}
3218
3223 __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS Image(const cl_mem &image) : Memory(image) {}
3224
3229 Image &operator=(const cl_mem &rhs) {
3230 Memory::operator=(rhs);
3231 return *this;
3232 }
3233
3237 Image(const Image &img) : Memory(img) {}
3238
3242 Image &operator=(const Image &img) {
3243 Memory::operator=(img);
3244 return *this;
3245 }
3246
3247#if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
3251 Image(Image &&img) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT : Memory(std::move(img)) {}
3252
3256 Image &operator=(Image &&img) {
3257 Memory::operator=(std::move(img));
3258 return *this;
3259 }
3260#endif // #if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
3261
3262public:
3264 template <typename T>
3265 cl_int getImageInfo(cl_image_info name, T *param) const {
3266 return detail::errHandler(
3267 detail::getInfo(&::clGetImageInfo, object_, name, param),
3268 __GET_IMAGE_INFO_ERR);
3269 }
3270
3272 template <cl_int name>
3273 typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_image_info, name>::param_type
3274 getImageInfo(cl_int *err = NULL) const {
3275 typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_image_info, name>::param_type
3276 param;
3277 cl_int result = getImageInfo(name, &param);
3278 if (err != NULL) {
3279 *err = result;
3280 }
3281 return param;
3282 }
3283};
3284
3285#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
3292class Image1D : public Image {
3293public:
3298 Image1D(const Context &context, cl_mem_flags flags, ImageFormat format,
3299 ::size_t width, void *host_ptr = NULL, cl_int *err = NULL) {
3300 cl_int error;
3301 cl_image_desc desc = {CL_MEM_OBJECT_IMAGE1D, width, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0};
3302 object_ =
3303 ::clCreateImage(context(), flags, &format, &desc, host_ptr, &error);
3304
3305 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE_ERR);
3306 if (err != NULL) {
3307 *err = error;
3308 }
3309 }
3310
3312 Image1D() {}
3313
3318 __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS Image1D(const cl_mem &image1D) : Image(image1D) {}
3319
3324 Image1D &operator=(const cl_mem &rhs) {
3325 Image::operator=(rhs);
3326 return *this;
3327 }
3328
3332 Image1D(const Image1D &img) : Image(img) {}
3333
3337 Image1D &operator=(const Image1D &img) {

3339 return *this;
3340 }
3341
3342#if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)

3347
3351 Image1D &operator=(Image1D &&img) {

3353 return *this;
3354 }
3355#endif // #if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
3356};

3364 ::size_t width, const Buffer &buffer, cl_int *err = NULL) {
3365 cl_int error;
3366 cl_image_desc desc = {
3367 CL_MEM_OBJECT_IMAGE1D_BUFFER, width, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, buffer()};
3368 object_ = ::clCreateImage(context(), flags, &format, &desc, NULL, &error);
3369
3370 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE_ERR);
3371 if (err != NULL) {

3373 }
3374 }

3418class Image1DArray : public Image {
3419public:
3420 Image1DArray(const Context &context, cl_mem_flags flags, ImageFormat format,
3421 ::size_t arraySize, ::size_t width, ::size_t rowPitch,
3422 void *host_ptr = NULL, cl_int *err = NULL) {
3423 cl_int error;
3424 cl_image_desc desc = {CL_MEM_OBJECT_IMAGE1D_ARRAY,
3425 width,
3426 0,
3427 0, // height, depth (unused)
3428 arraySize,
3429 rowPitch,
3430 0,
3431 0,
3432 0,
3433 0};
3434 object_ =
3435 ::clCreateImage(context(), flags, &format, &desc, host_ptr, &error);
3436
3437 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE_ERR);
3438 if (err != NULL) {
3439 *err = error;
3440 }
3441 }
3442
3443 Image1DArray() {}
3444
3445 __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS Image1DArray(const cl_mem &imageArray)
3446 : Image(imageArray) {}
3447
3448 Image1DArray &operator=(const cl_mem &rhs) {
3449 Image::operator=(rhs);
3450 return *this;
3451 }
3452
3456 Image1DArray(const Image1DArray &img) : Image(img) {}
3457
3461 Image1DArray &operator=(const Image1DArray &img) {
3462 Image::operator=(img);
3463 return *this;
3464 }
3465
3466#if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
3470 Image1DArray(Image1DArray &&img) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT : Image(std::move(img)) {}
3471
3475 Image1DArray &operator=(Image1DArray &&img) {
3476 Image::operator=(std::move(img));
3477 return *this;
3478 }
3479#endif // #if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
3480};
3481#endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
3482
3489class Image2D : public Image {
3490public:
3495 Image2D(const Context &context, cl_mem_flags flags, ImageFormat format,
3496 ::size_t width, ::size_t height, ::size_t row_pitch = 0,
3497 void *host_ptr = NULL, cl_int *err = NULL) {
3498 cl_int error;
3499 bool useCreateImage;
3500
3501#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2) && defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
3502 // Run-time decision based on the actual platform
3503 {
3504 cl_uint version = detail::getContextPlatformVersion(context());
3505 useCreateImage = (version >= 0x10002); // OpenCL 1.2 or above
3506 }
3507#elif defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
3508 useCreateImage = true;
3509#else
3510 useCreateImage = false;
3511#endif
3512
3513#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
3514 if (useCreateImage) {
3515 cl_image_desc desc = {CL_MEM_OBJECT_IMAGE2D,
3516 width,
3517 height,
3518 0,
3519 0, // depth, array size (unused)
3520 row_pitch,
3521 0,
3522 0,
3523 0,
3524 0};
3525 object_ =
3526 ::clCreateImage(context(), flags, &format, &desc, host_ptr, &error);
3527
3528 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE_ERR);
3529 if (err != NULL) {
3530 *err = error;
3531 }
3532 }
3533#endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
3534#if !defined(CL_VERSION_1_2) || defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
3535 if (!useCreateImage) {
3536 object_ = ::clCreateImage2D(context(), flags, &format, width, height,
3537 row_pitch, host_ptr, &error);
3538
3539 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE2D_ERR);
3540 if (err != NULL) {
3541 *err = error;
3542 }
3543 }
3544#endif // #if !defined(CL_VERSION_1_2) ||
3545 // defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
3546 }
3547
3549 Image2D() {}
3550
3555 __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS Image2D(const cl_mem &image2D) : Image(image2D) {}
3556
3561 Image2D &operator=(const cl_mem &rhs) {
3562 Image::operator=(rhs);
3563 return *this;
3564 }
3565
3569 Image2D(const Image2D &img) : Image(img) {}
3570
3574 Image2D &operator=(const Image2D &img) {
3575 Image::operator=(img);
3576 return *this;
3577 }
3578
3579#if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
3583 Image2D(Image2D &&img) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT : Image(std::move(img)) {}
3584
3588 Image2D &operator=(Image2D &&img) {
3589 Image::operator=(std::move(img));
3590 return *this;
3591 }
3592#endif // #if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
3593};
3594
3595#if !defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
3605class CL_EXT_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED Image2DGL
3606 CL_EXT_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED : public Image2D {
3607public:
3613 Image2DGL(const Context &context, cl_mem_flags flags, cl_GLenum target,
3614 cl_GLint miplevel, cl_GLuint texobj, cl_int *err = NULL) {
3615 cl_int error;
3616 object_ = ::clCreateFromGLTexture2D(context(), flags, target, miplevel,
3617 texobj, &error);
3618
3619 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_GL_TEXTURE_2D_ERR);
3620 if (err != NULL) {
3621 *err = error;
3622 }
3623 }
3624
3626 Image2DGL() : Image2D() {}
3627
3632 __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS Image2DGL(const cl_mem &image) : Image2D(image) {}
3633
3638 Image2DGL &operator=(const cl_mem &rhs) {
3639 Image2D::operator=(rhs);
3640 return *this;
3641 }
3642
3646 Image2DGL(const Image2DGL &img) : Image2D(img) {}
3647
3651 Image2DGL &operator=(const Image2DGL &img) {
3652 Image2D::operator=(img);
3653 return *this;
3654 }
3655
3656#if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
3660 Image2DGL(Image2DGL &&img) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT : Image2D(std::move(img)) {}
3661
3665 Image2DGL &operator=(Image2DGL &&img) {
3666 Image2D::operator=(std::move(img));
3667 return *this;
3668 }
3669#endif // #if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
3670};
3671#endif // #if !defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)

3673#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
3677class Image2DArray : public Image {
3678public:
3679 Image2DArray(const Context &context, cl_mem_flags flags, ImageFormat format,
3680 ::size_t arraySize, ::size_t width, ::size_t height,
3681 ::size_t rowPitch, ::size_t slicePitch, void *host_ptr = NULL,
3682 cl_int *err = NULL) {
3683 cl_int error;
3684 cl_image_desc desc = {CL_MEM_OBJECT_IMAGE2D_ARRAY,
3685 width,
3686 height,
3687 0, // depth (unused)
3688 arraySize,
3689 rowPitch,
3690 slicePitch,
3691 0,
3692 0,
3693 0};
3694 object_ =
3695 ::clCreateImage(context(), flags, &format, &desc, host_ptr, &error);
3696
3697 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE_ERR);
3698 if (err != NULL) {
3699 *err = error;
3700 }
3701 }
3702
3703 Image2DArray() {}
3704

3706 : Image(imageArray) {}

3710 return *this;
3711 }

3724 }

3742
3749class Image3D : public Image {
3750public:
3755 Image3D(const Context &context, cl_mem_flags flags, ImageFormat format,
3756 ::size_t width, ::size_t height, ::size_t depth,
3757 ::size_t row_pitch = 0, ::size_t slice_pitch = 0,
3758 void *host_ptr = NULL, cl_int *err = NULL) {
3759 cl_int error;
3760 bool useCreateImage;
3761
3762#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2) && defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
3763 // Run-time decision based on the actual platform
3764 {
3765 cl_uint version = detail::getContextPlatformVersion(context());
3766 useCreateImage = (version >= 0x10002); // OpenCL 1.2 or above
3767 }
3768#elif defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
3769 useCreateImage = true;
3770#else
3771 useCreateImage = false;
3772#endif
3773
3774#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
3775 if (useCreateImage) {
3776 cl_image_desc desc = {CL_MEM_OBJECT_IMAGE3D,
3777 width,
3778 height,
3779 depth,
3780 0, // array size (unused)
3781 row_pitch,
3782 slice_pitch,
3783 0,
3784 0,
3785 0};
3786 object_ =
3787 ::clCreateImage(context(), flags, &format, &desc, host_ptr, &error);
3788
3789 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE_ERR);
3790 if (err != NULL) {
3791 *err = error;
3792 }
3793 }
3794#endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
3795#if !defined(CL_VERSION_1_2) || defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
3796 if (!useCreateImage) {
3797 object_ =
3798 ::clCreateImage3D(context(), flags, &format, width, height, depth,
3799 row_pitch, slice_pitch, host_ptr, &error);
3800
3801 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE3D_ERR);
3802 if (err != NULL) {
3803 *err = error;
3804 }
3805 }
3806#endif // #if !defined(CL_VERSION_1_2) ||
3807 // defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
3808 }
3809
3811 Image3D() : Image() {}
3812
3817 __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS Image3D(const cl_mem &image3D) : Image(image3D) {}
3818
3823 Image3D &operator=(const cl_mem &rhs) {
3824 Image::operator=(rhs);
3825 return *this;
3826 }
3827
3831 Image3D(const Image3D &img) : Image(img) {}
3832
3836 Image3D &operator=(const Image3D &img) {
3837 Image::operator=(img);
3838 return *this;
3839 }
3840
3841#if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
3845 Image3D(Image3D &&img) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT : Image(std::move(img)) {}
3846
3850 Image3D &operator=(Image3D &&img) {
3851 Image::operator=(std::move(img));
3852 return *this;
3853 }
3854#endif // #if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
3855};
3856

3940class ImageGL : public Image {

3946 texobj, &error);

3951 }

3992
4001class BufferRenderGL :
4002#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4003 public ImageGL
4004#else // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4005 public Image2DGL
4006#endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4007{
4008public:
4014 BufferRenderGL(const Context &context, cl_mem_flags flags, cl_GLuint bufobj,
4015 cl_int *err = NULL) {
4016 cl_int error;
4017 object_ = ::clCreateFromGLRenderbuffer(context(), flags, bufobj, &error);
4018
4019 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_GL_RENDER_BUFFER_ERR);
4020 if (err != NULL) {
4021 *err = error;
4022 }
4023 }
4024
4026#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4027 BufferRenderGL() : ImageGL(){};
4028#else // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4029 BufferRenderGL() : Image2DGL(){};
4030#endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4031
4036#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4037 __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS BufferRenderGL(const cl_mem &buffer)
4038 : ImageGL(buffer) {}
4039#else // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4040 __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS BufferRenderGL(const cl_mem &buffer)
4041 : Image2DGL(buffer) {}
4042#endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4043
4048 BufferRenderGL &operator=(const cl_mem &rhs) {
4049#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4050 ImageGL::operator=(rhs);
4051#else // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4052 Image2DGL::operator=(rhs);
4053#endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4054
4055 return *this;
4056 }
4057
4061#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4062 BufferRenderGL(const BufferRenderGL &buf) : ImageGL(buf) {}
4063#else // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4064 BufferRenderGL(const BufferRenderGL &buf) : Image2DGL(buf) {}
4065#endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4066
4070 BufferRenderGL &operator=(const BufferRenderGL &rhs) {
4071#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4072 ImageGL::operator=(rhs);
4073#else // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4074 Image2DGL::operator=(rhs);
4075#endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4076 return *this;
4077 }
4078
4079#if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
4083#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4084 BufferRenderGL(BufferRenderGL &&buf) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT
4085 : ImageGL(std::move(buf)) {}
4086#else // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4087 BufferRenderGL(BufferRenderGL &&buf) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT
4088 : Image2DGL(std::move(buf)) {}
4089#endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4090
4094 BufferRenderGL &operator=(BufferRenderGL &&buf) {
4095#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4096 ImageGL::operator=(std::move(buf));
4097#else // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4098 Image2DGL::operator=(std::move(buf));
4099#endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4100
4101 return *this;
4102 }
4103#endif // #if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
4104
4106 cl_int getObjectInfo(cl_gl_object_type *type, cl_GLuint *gl_object_name) {
4107 return detail::errHandler(
4108 ::clGetGLObjectInfo(object_, type, gl_object_name),
4109 __GET_GL_OBJECT_INFO_ERR);
4110 }
4111};
4112
4121class Sampler : public detail::Wrapper<cl_sampler> {
4122public:
4124 Sampler() {}
4125
4130 Sampler(const Context &context, cl_bool normalized_coords,
4131 cl_addressing_mode addressing_mode, cl_filter_mode filter_mode,
4132 cl_int *err = NULL) {
4133 cl_int error;
4134 object_ = ::clCreateSampler(context(), normalized_coords, addressing_mode,
4135 filter_mode, &error);
4136
4137 detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_SAMPLER_ERR);
4138 if (err != NULL) {
4139 *err = error;
4140 }
4141 }
4142
4148 __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS Sampler(const cl_sampler &sampler)
4149 : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(sampler) {}
4150
4156 Sampler &operator=(const cl_sampler &rhs) {
4157 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
4158 return *this;
4159 }
4160
4164 Sampler(const Sampler &sam) : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(sam) {}
4165
4169 Sampler &operator=(const Sampler &sam) {
4170 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(sam);
4171 return *this;
4172 }
4173
4174#if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
4178 Sampler(Sampler &&sam) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT
4179 : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(std::move(sam)) {}
4180
4184 Sampler &operator=(Sampler &&sam) {
4185 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(std::move(sam));
4186 return *this;
4187 }
4188#endif // #if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
4189
4191 template <typename T> cl_int getInfo(cl_sampler_info name, T *param) const {
4192 return detail::errHandler(
4193 detail::getInfo(&::clGetSamplerInfo, object_, name, param),
4194 __GET_SAMPLER_INFO_ERR);
4195 }
4196
4198 template <cl_int name>
4199 typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_sampler_info, name>::param_type
4200 getInfo(cl_int *err = NULL) const {
4201 typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_sampler_info, name>::param_type
4202 param;
4203 cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
4204 if (err != NULL) {
4205 *err = result;
4206 }
4207 return param;
4208 }
4209};
4210
4211class Program;
4212class CommandQueue;
4213class Kernel;
4214
4216class NDRange {
4217private:
4218 size_t<3> sizes_;
4219 cl_uint dimensions_;
4220
4221public:
4223 NDRange() : dimensions_(0) {}
4224
4226 NDRange(::size_t size0) : dimensions_(1) { sizes_[0] = size0; }
4227
4229 NDRange(::size_t size0, ::size_t size1) : dimensions_(2) {
4230 sizes_[0] = size0;
4231 sizes_[1] = size1;
4232 }
4233
4235 NDRange(::size_t size0, ::size_t size1, ::size_t size2) : dimensions_(3) {
4236 sizes_[0] = size0;
4237 sizes_[1] = size1;
4238 sizes_[2] = size2;
4239 }
4240
4245 operator const ::size_t *() const { return (const ::size_t *)sizes_; }
4246
4248 ::size_t dimensions() const { return dimensions_; }
4249};
4250
4252static const NDRange NullRange;
4253
4255struct LocalSpaceArg {
4256 ::size_t size_;
4257};
4258
4259namespace detail {
4260
4261template <typename T> struct KernelArgumentHandler {
4262 static ::size_t size(const T &) { return sizeof(T); }
4263 static const T *ptr(const T &value) { return &value; }
4264};
4265
4266template <> struct KernelArgumentHandler<LocalSpaceArg> {
4267 static ::size_t size(const LocalSpaceArg &value) { return value.size_; }
4268 static const void *ptr(const LocalSpaceArg &) { return NULL; }
4269};
4270
4271} // namespace detail
4273
4278inline CL_EXT_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED LocalSpaceArg
4279__local(::size_t size) CL_EXT_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED;
4280inline LocalSpaceArg __local(::size_t size) {
4281 LocalSpaceArg ret = {size};
4282 return ret;
4283}
4284
4288inline LocalSpaceArg Local(::size_t size) {
4289 LocalSpaceArg ret = {size};
4290 return ret;
4291}
4292
4293// class KernelFunctor;
4294
4303class Kernel : public detail::Wrapper<cl_kernel> {
4304public:
4305 inline Kernel(const Program &program, const char *name, cl_int *err = NULL);
4306
4308 Kernel() {}
4309
4315 __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS Kernel(const cl_kernel &kernel)
4316 : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(kernel) {}
4317
4323 Kernel &operator=(const cl_kernel &rhs) {
4324 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
4325 return *this;
4326 }
4327
4331 Kernel(const Kernel &kernel) : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(kernel) {}
4332
4336 Kernel &operator=(const Kernel &kernel) {
4337 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(kernel);
4338 return *this;
4339 }
4340
4341#if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
4345 Kernel(Kernel &&kernel) CL_HPP_NOEXCEPT
4346 : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(std::move(kernel)) {}
4347
4351 Kernel &operator=(Kernel &&kernel) {
4352 detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(std::move(kernel));
4353 return *this;
4354 }
4355#endif // #if defined(CL_HPP_RVALUE_REFERENCES_SUPPORTED)
4356
4357 template <typename T> cl_int getInfo(cl_kernel_info name, T *param) const {
4358 return detail::errHandler(
4359 detail::getInfo(&::clGetKernelInfo, object_, name, param),
4360 __GET_KERNEL_INFO_ERR);
4361 }
4362
4363 template <cl_int name>
4364 typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_kernel_info, name>::param_type
4365 getInfo(cl_int *err = NULL) const {
4366 typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_kernel_info, name>::param_type
4367 param;
4368 cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
4369 if (err != NULL) {
4370 *err = result;
4371 }
4372 return param;
4373 }
4374
4375#if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)

4378 return detail::errHandler(
4379 detail::getInfo(&::clGetKernelArgInfo, object_, argIndex, name, param),
4380 __GET_KERNEL_ARG_INFO_ERR);
4381 }
4382
4383 template <cl_int name>
4384 typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_kernel_arg_info, name>::param_type
4385 getArgInfo(cl_uint argIndex, cl_int *err = NULL) const {
4386 typename detail::param_traits<detail::cl_kernel_arg_info, name>::param_type
4387 param;
4388 cl_int result = getArgInfo(argIndex, name, &param);
4389 if (err != NULL) {
4390 *err = result;
4391 }
4392 return param;
4393 }
4394#endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4395
4396 template <typename T>
4397 cl_int getWorkGroupInfo(const Device &device, cl_kernel_work_group_info name,
4398 T *param) const {
4399 return detail::errHandler(detail::getInfo(&::clGetKernelWorkGroupInfo,
4400 object_, device(), name, param),
4401 __GET_KERNEL_WORK_GROUP_INFO_ERR);
4402 }
